long_description: Climbers on windy or wet alpine ascents will relish the men's Patagonia Leashless Jacket. This technical GORE-TEX(R) rain shell is waterproof, windproof and breathable, with superb arm mobility. 3-layer GORE-TEX Active fabric delivers excellent breathability and next-to-skin comfort for highly aerobic mountain endeavors; fully waterproof and windproof. Articulated pattern improves mobility and fully accommodates arms-over-head motion. 2-way-adjustable, helmet-compatible hood with laminated visor offers good visibility in poor conditions. Microfleece-lined back of neck and windflap provide soft next-to-skin comfort. Venting pit-zips feature coated, watertight 2-way zippers. Pockets: exterior left chest with coated, watertight zipper; interior right chest; welted handwarmers with water-repellent zippers. Patagonia Leashless Jacket for men features rip-and-stick cuff closures and single-pull adjustable drawcord hem to seal out weather.
short_description: Climbers on windy or wet alpine ascents will relish the men's Patagonia Leashless Jacket. This technical GORE-TEX(R) rain shell is waterproof, windproof and breathable, with superb arm mobility.
